original_text: For when God made a promise to Abraham, since he had no one greater by whom to swear, he swore by himself,
korean_text: 하나님이 아브라함에게 약속하실 때에 가리켜 맹세할 자가 자기보다 더 큰 이가 없으므로 자기를 가리켜 맹세하여

sentences.original_text: when God made a promise to Abraham
since he had no one greater by whom to swear
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게는 맹세할 더 위대한 존재가 없었기 때문에
